segments.text: Look at that woman, so focused on her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's going to slip on that wet floor any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, they're going to get into trouble if they're not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for the cookie jar, and that stool is so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a slow-motion accident about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what's going through their minds right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm garden outside and the chaos inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I should probably do something, but I'm just frozen, watching it all unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is all so fascinating and yet a bit terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR
